name: studious-couscous
description: A comprehensive project management and collaboration platform with real-time features

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd server && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server

author: TaylorsBar
